issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead

Fixed screen orientations will be ignored in most cases, starting from Android 16. Android is moving toward a model where apps are expected to adapt to various orientations, display sizes, and aspect ratios.

The intent action `com.iie.st10320489.stylu.NEW_NOTIFICATION (used to send a broadcast)` matches the intent filter of a non-exported receiver, registered via a call to `Context.registerReceiver`, or similar. If you are trying to invoke this specific receiver via the action then you should use `Intent.setPackage(<APPLICATION_ID>)`.

The intent action `com.iie.st10320489.stylu.NEW_NOTIFICATION (used to send a broadcast)` matches the intent filter of a non-exported receiver, registered via a call to `Context.registerReceiver`, or similar.
